title: 51st: ‘Take This Thing To The Streets’
dc:creator: Mikaela Lefrak
description: The civil rights movement is reshaping D.C.'s push for representation and local control. Will local leaders like Walter Fauntroy and Marion Barry be able to get the city on solid ground? This is the third episode of 51st, from WAMU's What's With Washington. To support the show, visit wamu.org/supportwhatswith.
